attributes.review: APP KEPT ASKING FOR MY LOCATION?? IS THIS EVEN NORMAL FOR AN APP LIKE THIS. I SAID NO FOR A REASON BUT IT KEPT ASKIN EVERY SINGLE 2 MIN FOR MY LOCATION. ALONG WITH THAT I FOUND THIS APP COMPLETELY USELESS.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
